110-12 South 3rd Street, adjoining the southest corner of Berry Street, showing the old Brooklyn Hospital and Dispensary. 1t first appe rs on an 1886 atlas of the City of Brooklyn. Sperr 2refers to it as "The Relief," probably referring to it; being used,at this tume,as a station of the Home Relief Bureau.
P. L. Sperr  May 1, 1936
